fullContent: Home› GirlGet Ready Summer PicnicBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenSummer is here, and it’s time for fun in the sun! In Get Ready Summer Picnic, you’ll join a group of four stylish besties as they prep for the ultimate beach picnic. From glowing makeup to cute sundresses and yummy baskets full of fruits and snacks, this free game is all about fashion, friendship, and good vibes. It’s colorful, creative, and super chill, just like a real summer day at the beach!ControlsMouse Click: Select items, apply makeup, and choose outfitsChoose Your GirlStart by selecting the first of the four girls to GTWM first. Each one has a different hairstyle and personality. Pick the first girl to begin the makeover fun! As you complete, you'll unlock other girls.Makeup TimeApply bright and beachy makeup. There are several lipstick shades, eyeshadows, and blush options to experiment with. Want sparkly eyes and a glossy lip? Go for it! This is your chance to mix and match for that perfect summer glow.Dress UpNow it’s time to find the cutest picnic outfit! Try out a variety of dresses with polka dots, florals, and fresh summer vibes. Match the look with fun earrings and a necklace to complete the fit.Pick a Picnic BasketNo picnic is complete without snacks! Choose from different picnic baskets, some with fruit, others with cameras, sunglasses, water bottles, or even sunflowers. Each basket matches the vibe of the outfit and adds charm to the whole look.Repeat for Each FriendOnce your first girl is picnic-ready, go back and help the rest of the squad get dressed, too. You’ll unlock their stations one by one until all four are fully styled and beach-ready!DeveloperThis stylish summer dress-up game is designed by FreezeNova for players who love fashion, creativity, and casual fun. It's one of many casual online games aimed at younger audiences, encouraging their inner fashionista!More Online Makeover Games You’ll LoveIf you like dress-up games full of tropical fashion and vacation vibes, check out our whole library at the fashion games online page. Our favorite is Barbiemania. It has a great wardrobe and makeup options. We bet you'll love it too.
